description.en: Perfect for small farms and individual farmers starting their aquaculture journey
description.ar: مثالي للمزارع الصغيرة والمزارعين الأفراد الذين يبدأون رحلتهم في تربية الأحياء المائية

description.en: Ideal for growing farms that need advanced features and better support
description.ar: مثالي للمزارع النامية التي تحتاج إلى ميزات متقدمة ودعم أفضل

description.en: For large operations requiring unlimited resources, custom solutions, and dedicated support
description.ar: للمؤسسات الكبيرة التي تتطلب موارد غير محدودة وحلول مخصصة ودعم مخصص

en.biological_management: Manage species, batches, ponds, and biological data
en.daily_operations: Record feeding, mortality, water quality, and daily activities
en.inventory_management: Track feed, supplies, and inventory levels
en.basic_reports: Standard reports for batches, ponds, and operations
en.sales_management: Manage harvests, sales orders, and invoices
en.advanced_reports: Advanced analytics, custom KPIs, and detailed insights
en.accounting: Full accounting module with financial reports and transactions
en.zatca_integration: Integration with ZATCA (Saudi Tax Authority) for e-invoicing
en.iot_integration: Connect IoT sensors for real-time monitoring
en.api_access: RESTful API access for integrations and automation
en.custom_reports: Create and customize your own reports
en.data_export: Export data to Excel, CSV, and PDF formats
en.priority_support: Priority email and phone support with faster response times
en.multi_location: Manage multiple farm locations from one account
en.audit_logs: Complete audit trail of all system activities

notes.en: Set quota values to null for unlimited access. All prices are in Saudi Riyal (SAR).
